SELECT S.STUDENT_CODE , STUDENT_NAME , STUDENT_YEAR , STUDENT_GENDER , STUDENT_LESSON_CODE , L.LESSON_INFO_CODE , L.SUBJECT_CODE , (SELECT SUBJECT_NAME FROM SUBJECT WHERE SUBJECT_CODE = L.SUBJECT_CODE) AS SUBJECT_NAME , (SELECT STEP_NAME FROM STEP WHERE STEP_CODE = L.STEP_CODE) AS STEP_NAME , YEAR , L.TEACHER_CODE , TEACHER_NAME FROM LESSON_INFO L, STUDENT_LESSON_INFO SL , STUDENT S, TEACHER T WHERE L.LESSON_INFO_CODE = SL.LESSON_INFO_CODE AND S.STUDENT_CODE = SL.STUDENT_CODE AND STUDENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND L.TEACHER_CODE = T.TEACHER_CODE
AND STUDENT_NAME LIKE ('%'||#{studentName}||'%')
AND TEACHER_NAME LIKE ('%'||#{teacherName}||'%')
AND LESSON_INFO_CODE LIKE ('%'||#{lessonInfoCode}||'%')
SELECT TEST_CODE , SUBJECT_CODE , STUDENT_CODE , TEST_DATE , SCORE FROM TEST WHERE SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} AND STUDENT_CODE = #{studentCode} AND TEST_DATE = TO_DATE(#{testDate} , 'yyyy/mm/dd')
SELECT TEST_CODE , SUBJECT_CODE , STUDENT_CODE , TO_CHAR(TEST_DATE, 'MM-DD') AS TEST_DATE , SCORE FROM TEST WHERE SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} AND STUDENT_CODE = #{studentCode}
